description._instruction: Enter a description of this device.

digitalIdentifier._instruction: Add any digital, persistent and universal unique identifier assigned to this individual device.

lookupLabel._instruction: Enter a lookup label for this device that may help you to more easily find it again.

manufacturer._instruction: Add the private or industrial manufacturer (person or organization) that constructed this device.

name._instruction: Enter the name of this device, preferably including the model name as defined by the manufacturer.

owner._instruction: Add all legal owners (person or organization) of this device.

serialNumber._instruction: Enter the serial number of this device.

deviceType._instruction: Add the type of this device.
